Reason: The configuration option 'networking_cache_size_in_mb' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'NETWORKING_MEMORY_USAGE_THRESHOLD' is calculated based on the value of 'DatabaseDescriptor.getNetworkingCacheSizeInMB()', which directly affects the memory usage of the 'NETWORKING_POOL'. The 'NETWORKING_POOL' is used for client-server or inter-node requests, which are time-expensive operations. Therefore, any changes in the 'networking_cache_size_in_mb' configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making it performance-sensitive.
